page.shortlink: ux server-side actions Change Web Security Password
page.description: Change a user's password in the web security system.

section.description: There are 2 UX templates that use this method:

The "Change Web Security Password" action's only intended use is to change a password. It is similar to the change password view in the login component. Since it doesn't load any data, the only code is action scripting added to the [afterDialogValidate] event.
